comment: Trump ran as a nationalist populist, not as a conservative. We are more than an economy - Bush had a strong economy for years and look at his legacy. If you want to suck Trump's dick, point out what he's done that Bush or Rubio wouldn't have done. SC justices & tax cuts don't cut it. Where is the damn wall? Also, the fuck does Korea have to do with our people?
